凷字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【凵字部】　凷； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页135第07
【唐韻】苦對切【集韻】苦會切，?音塊。【說文】墣也。从土凵。【集韻】土也。【前漢·律歷志】野人舉凷而與之。【蔡邕·釋誨】九河盈溢，非一凷所能防。【韻會】今作塊。【莊子·齊物論】大塊噫氣。又作蕢。【禮·禮運】蕢桴而土鼓。【註】蕢讀爲凷，堛也。【集韻】或作墤。又【集韻】苦怪切【正韻】苦夬切，?音蒯。義同。又?。

[Subset 2] [Department of 凵 characters] 　凷; Kangxi strokes: 5; Page number: page 135 to 07
[Tang Yun] Cut with bitterness [Jiyun] Cut with bitterness, sound block. [Said the text] Chi also. From the soil. [Jiyun] Soil also. [Previous Han·Lüzhi] The savages held their arms with them. [Cai Yong·Shi Ku] The Nine Rivers overflow, which is beyond what Yi Ji can prevent. [Rhyme Club] This is a block. [Zhuangzi·Qiwu Lun] A big piece of anger. Also made 蒉. 【Ritual·Ritual fortune】Like and earthy drums. [Note] Lei is pronounced 凷, 堛也. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo Chang. Also [Jiyun] bitter and strange cut [zhengyun] bitterly cut,? Yinkuai.
